THANK YOU FOR JOINING US FOR LCPS STORYTIME! Join us each week day on the LCPS, KES, or VES Facebook page and on our website at 7:30 p.m. Today, Ken Vaiden, Librarian at Victoria Elementary School,...

CHS AFTER PROM RAFFLE EXTENDED! Our CHS After Prom raffle will now be held on Thursday, April 30 at 7 p.m. Tickets are $2. Prizes are an Eldridge Bagley print, a Charger Wreath with a 2020-2021 Athletic Pass, and a Charger Pride Bundle. Please see Wendy Meade, Tony Craven, or Mary Ann Stearnes if you would like to purchase one before Thursday!

TODAY IS THE DAY! Free meals will be offered from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. today at Central High School and Kenbridge Elementary School. A child must be present with the parent to pick up food. Also, Virginia Cooperative Extension will give away FREE Dogwood and Red Bud Tree Seedlings while supplies last at both locations!

Good evening LCPS Families! Please keep checking our website and the division and school Facebook pages for up to date information from the school system. Also, please download our app and enable push notifications as well. Our Learning Portal can be accessed on our website. Please check it regularly. And please make sure that students who have school email are checking it and their google classrooms. Let's work together to keep our students learning!

Good afternoon LCPS Families! Lunenburg Middle School and Central High School Students that do not have access to online materials and have requested a paper packet may pick up learning packets at their school on Thursday, April 30 from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. and 4 to 6 p.m. If you canâ€™t make then, pick up is also available on Monday, May 4 and Thursday, May 7 from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m.
